content.question: The methods used to express the ideas in the public service announcements have the most in common with those of female activists who

choices.label: participated in the Second Great Awakening
engaged in Progressive Era reform movements
advocated on behalf of the Fourteenth Amendment
promoted the ideal of republican motherhood

content.answer: engaged in Progressive Era reform movements

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
